Job Type:
Full-time
Matches your job preferences, job type is Full-time.
Description:
About the job
Company Description
Graphē is a design studio based in Kolkata that offers diverse design solutions to individuals and companies. From brand identity development to print designs for fabrics, we cater to the design needs of every industry. Our team of passionate designers and artists strives to provide thoughtful and engaging design solutions.

Role Description
We are seeking a Full-Stack Developer with deep expertise in React.js, Node.js, and Python to lead the design and development of high-performance, scalable web applications. You’ll work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver robust digital solutions while also mentoring junior developers and driving architectural decisions.

Key Responsibilities:
Frontend Development (React.js)
Architect, develop, and maintain advanced user interfaces using React.js, TypeScript, and modern component libraries (e.g., MUI, Tailwind).
Optimize UI for performance, accessibility, and responsiveness across devices.
Integrate frontend with backend services via REST/GraphQL APIs.
Implement state management (Redux, Zustand, or Context API) effectively.

Backend Development (Node.js & Python)
Build RESTful and asynchronous APIs using Node.js (Express/Nest.js) and Python (Flask/FastAPI/Django).
Design and maintain scalable server-side architecture and microservices.
Work with both relational and non-relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis).
Develop and implement authentication/authorization protocols (JWT, OAuth2).
Manage background tasks and asynchronous workflows (e.g., using Celery with Python).

DevOps & Architecture
Lead code reviews, enforce best practices, and define coding standards.
Set up and maintain CI/CD pipelines and cloud deployments (AWS, GCP, or DigitalOcean).
Implement containerization (Docker) and orchestrate services (Kubernetes or Docker Compose).
Ensure application security, performance tuning, and API monitoring/logging.

Team Collaboration & Leadership
Collaborate with product managers, UI/UX designers, and other developers to align technical and business goals.
Mentor junior developers and lead by example in writing clean, scalable, and maintainable code.
Take ownership of projects from concept to deployment and support.

Required Skills & Qualifications:
2–3 years of full stack development experience.
Expert proficiency in React.js, Node.js, and Python.
Strong understanding of system design, architecture patterns, and full software development lifecycle.
Proficient in working with Git, Docker, PostgreSQL/MongoDB, REST/GraphQL, and Cloud Services.
Experience in developing scalable microservices and handling high traffic systems.
Solid understanding of testing frameworks (Jest, Mocha, PyTest, etc.).
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.

Nice-to-Have / Bonus Skills:
Experience with Next.js or Server-Side Rendering (SSR).
Background in machine learning or data engineering using Python.
Familiarity with infrastructure-as-code tools (Terraform, Ansible).
Experience with real-time communication (WebSockets, Socket.IO).

Joining : Immediate (On-Site Only).
Apply by sending your CV and portfolio at careers@thegraphe.com.

Description:
About the job
Our company: 
A fast-growing start-up headquartered in San Francisco, CA, USA in the heart of Silicon Valley. We recruit worldwide as our customer base is global. All employees outside San Francisco headquarter work remotely.

Elife is a Startup developing innovative technology in the passenger transport industry, providing any type of ground transportation worldwide, including Group/event transportation, NEMT transportation, senior and disability transportation, pet relocation, bilingual driver for non-English speak clients.

Our market is the world. Our customers are everywhere. Our platform and apps are built on the cloud. We have endless exciting problems to solve and we only use the best and latest technology.

Vision: Reliable ground transportation services globally with all types of vehicles. 

Mission: Empower high-quality local fleets.

Job Title: Senior Backend Python Developer
Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and maintain backend applications for customers worldwide.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including frontend, backend, testing, and application design, to deliver integrated solutions.
Build and optimize Python/MySQL backends hosted on Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Enhance, maintain, and troubleshoot existing software applications to ensure performance and reliability.
Write clean, highly scalable, and testable code following best practices.
Identify, analyze, and resolve programming bugs and performance bottlenecks.
Contribute to technical documentation and knowledge sharing across the team.

What We’re Looking For:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).
5+ years of experience in backend development, particularly with web and mobile applications.
Strong expertise in Python and MySQL, with proven experience building scalable applications.
Hands-on experience with AWS cloud services.
Solid understanding of software development lifecycle (SDLC), version control, and CI/CD practices.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail.
Ability to manage time effectively and deliver in a fast-paced, global environment.
A proactive, can-do attitude and the ability to learn quickly.
Strong teamwork and communication skills, with a collaborative mindset.
Understanding of ML fundamentals, Building APIs/services to serve ML models

Our Apps 
Single-page web app running on both PC and mobile devices.
Python/MySQL backend hosted on Amazon Web Services.
Our customers and markets are worldwide in North America, South America, Asia, Europe, and Africa.

Job Type:
Full-time
Matches your job preferences, job type is Full-time.
Description:
About the job
Company Description
Abekus is a career advancement platform dedicated to helping learners build in-demand skills and gain the confidence needed to excel in their professional journeys. By providing structured practice, expert-driven content, and real-world preparation, Abekus empowers individuals to become job-ready and succeed in a competitive environment. Our mission is to bridge the gap between knowledge and application, enabling continuous learning and growth.

Role Description
We are looking for a talented React.js Developer on a full-time, remote basis. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality web applications with a focus on responsive and interactive user interfaces. You will leverage your expertise in React.js, modern JavaScript (ES6+), and related libraries to build scalable, performant, and user-friendly solutions that meet business and technical requirements.

Key Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain responsive web applications using React.js.
Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs and implement them effectively.
Optimize applications for maximum performance, scalability, and cross-browser compatibility.
Collaborate with designers, product managers, and backend developers to deliver robust solutions.
Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code following best practices.
Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve front-end issues quickly.
Stay updated with the latest trends, tools, and best practices in React.js and front-end development.

Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent professional experience.
Strong proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+), React.js, and Redux (or other state management libraries).
Solid understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design principles.
Experience with RESTful APIs and integrating front-end applications with backend services.
Familiarity with version control systems like Git.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills with attention to detail.
Strong communication and collaboration skills in a remote working environment.
Ability to work independently, manage multiple priorities, and deliver within deadlines.

Preferred Qualifications
Experience with TypeScript.
Familiarity with modern build tools such as Webpack, Babel, or Vite.
Knowledge of testing frameworks like Jest, React Testing Library, or Cypress.
Experience with UI frameworks (e.g., Material-UI, Tailwind CSS, Ant Design).
Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP) and CI/CD practices is a plus.
Understanding of performance optimization and accessibility best practices.

Job Type:
Full-time
Matches your job preferences, job type is Full-time.
Description:
About the job
Job Summary:
 We are seeking a skilled MERN Developer with 2–3 years of hands-on experience in building and optimizing full-stack web applications. The ideal candidate should have strong expertise in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) and the ability to design scalable, high-performance applications. This role requires solid problem-solving skills, collaborative teamwork, and the ability to deliver high-quality solutions within Agile environments.
Key Responsibilities:
Full-Stack Development: Build and maintain web applications using React (front-end) and Node.js/Express.js (back-end).
Database Management: Design schemas, write optimized queries, and ensure efficient integration with MongoDB and MySQL.
API Development & Integration: Develop RESTful APIs and integrate third-party services/microservices.
Performance Tuning: Troubleshoot and optimize applications for scalability, performance, and security.
Agile Practices: Actively participate in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, code reviews, and retrospectives.
Documentation: Maintain technical documentation for code, APIs, and deployment processes.
Continuous Improvement: Keep updated with emerging trends in MERN technologies and contribute ideas to improve development workflows.
Qualifications & Experience:
Education: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.
Experience: 2–3 years of proven experience in full-stack development with the MERN stack.
Technical Skills:
Proficiency in React.js (hooks, state management with Redux/Context API, component lifecycle).
Strong experience with Node.js & Express.js for server-side development.
Solid understanding of MongoDB (schema design, indexing, aggregation) and working knowledge of MySQL.
Expertise in JavaScript (ES6+) and familiarity with TypeScript.
Experience with build tools like Webpack, Vite, and CI/CD pipelines.
Knowledge of Git for version control.
Familiarity with cloud platforms (preferably GCP) and Docker/containerization.
Key Competencies:
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
Ability to work independently while collaborating in a team environment.
Good communication and documentation skills.
Proactive approach to learning and adapting to new technologies.

Role Overview

We are seeking a skilled Full Stack Developer, with a strong backend focus on Node.js, and working knowledge of React.js, to develop a custom enterprise platform.  Required Skills

4–6 years of professional development experience
Strong expertise in Node.js, including async patterns and performance tuning
Hands-on experience with AWS Lambda and serverless architecture
Experience building integrations with tools like JIRA, Jenkins, GitLab, Bitbucket, etc.
Working knowledge of React.js for UI development and integration
Solid understanding of RESTful APIs, Webhooks, and API security

Exposure to CI/CD practices and infrastructure as code

Good To Have

Experience with AWS services such as DynamoDB, S3, EventBridge, and Step Functions
Familiarity with enterprise SSO, OAuth2, or SAML
Prior experience automating tool admin tasks and DevOps workflows
Understanding of modern monitoring/logging tools like CloudWatch or ELK

A chance to work on a transformative platform with direct enterprise impact
Freedom to innovate and contribute to automation of key IT and DevOps functions
Exposure to modern architectures including serverless, microservices, and event-driven systems
Collaborative, outcome-oriented work culture
